quotes.quote: Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field. I'll meet you there. When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowinghow blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Donâ€™t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Dance, when you're broken open. Dance, if you've torn the bandage off. Dance in the middle of the fighting. Dance in your blood. Dance when you're perfectly free.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?
quotes.author: Rumi
Jamal Farah
quotes.quote: Quote me if I was misquoted.
